refnamediv.refpurpose: Mark a message for deletion from current mailbox

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: imap_delete marks messages listed in msg_number for deletion. The optional flags parameter only has a single option, FT_UID, which tells the function to treat the msg_number argument as a UID. Messages marked for deletion will stay in the mailbox until either imap_expunge is called or imap_close is called with the optional parameter CL_EXPUNGE.

note.para: POP3 mailboxes do not have their message flags saved between connections, so imap_expunge must be called during the same connection in order for messages marked for deletion to actually be purged.

example.title: imap_delete Beispiel
example.programlisting:
Nmsgs . "
\n" ; imap_delete ($mbox, 1); $check = imap_mailboxmsginfo ($mbox); print "Messages after delete: " . $check->Nmsgs . "
\n" ; imap_expunge ($mbox); $check = imap_mailboxmsginfo ($mbox); print "Messages after expunge: " . $check->Nmsgs . "
\n" ; imap_close ($mbox); ?>
